startPage.hero-text: Delivery of Goods from the UK to Russia
startPage.desc: Start saving up to 80% on shopping. Register with OkeyPost to buy discounted clothing, shoes, gadgets from famous UK brands, and safely send items to Russia.

section1.title: Let our shopping experts handle orders in English stores and free up time for more important matters.

section4.hero-text: OkeyPost Convenient and Fast Delivery of Parcels from the UK
section4.desc: Calculate the cost of delivery from England to your home. We will receive your parcels at the warehouse, if necessary, consolidate several shipments into one and send them to you securely packaged.

section6.hero-text: 4 Simple Steps for Your Purchases in the UK

section8.hero-text: 120,000 Satisfied Customers in Russia Have Already Made Their Choice
